pr_title: Re-work on adding template support for Pinot Ingestion Job Spec

timeline.message: Re-work on adding template support for Pinot Ingestion Job Spec

timeline.bodyText: What's the delimiter between two [template_key=template_value]? (Assuming ... indicates there's more than one of those.)
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText:
It will be space, the arg4j parse it into an array. Adding example in PR description:
bin/pinot-admin.sh LaunchDataIngestionJob  \
-jobSpecFile ingestionJobSpec.yaml \
-values year=2020 month=05 day=06 hour=07
replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: Yes, we can add. What do you expect the value for LATEST? same as TODAY?
